name: Adriana's Valor
oracle_text: Hidden agenda (Start the game with this conspiracy face down in the command zone and secretly name a card. You may turn this conspiracy face up any time and reveal the chosen name.)

Whenever a creature you control with the chosen name attacks, you may pay {W}. If you do, that creature gains indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it.)

name: Assemble the Rank and Vile
oracle_text: Hidden agenda (Start the game with this conspiracy face down in the command zone and secretly name a card. You may turn this conspiracy face up any time and reveal the chosen name.)
Creatures you control with the chosen name have "When this creature dies, you may pay {B}. If you do, create a tapped 2/2 black Zombie creature token."

name: Echoing Boon
oracle_text: Hidden agenda (Start the game with this conspiracy face down in the command zone and secretly name a card. You may turn this conspiracy face up any time and reveal the chosen name.)
Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, if it targets a creature you control with the chosen name, you may copy that spell and may choose new targets for the copy.

name: Emissary's Ploy
oracle_text: (Start the game with this conspiracy face up in the command zone.)
Before drawing your opening hand, choose 1, 2, or 3.
You may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast creature spells with converted mana cost equal to the chosen number.

name: Hired Heist
oracle_text: Hidden agenda (Start the game with this conspiracy face down in the command zone and secretly name a card. You may turn this conspiracy face up any time and reveal the chosen name.)
Whenever a creature you control with the chosen name deals combat damage to a player, you may pay {U}. If you do, draw a card.

name: Hold the Perimeter
oracle_text: (Start the game with this conspiracy face up in the command zone.)
At the beginning of your first upkeep, create a 1/2 white Soldier creature token with defender.
At the beginning of each other player's first upkeep, that player creates a 1/1 red Goblin creature token with "This creature can't block."

name: Hymn of the Wilds
oracle_text: (Start the game with this conspiracy face up in the command zone.)
The first creature spell you cast each turn costs {1} less to cast.
You can't cast instant or sorcery spells.
flavor_text: Many attempt to speak with nature. Selvala speaks less, and nature answers more.

name: Incendiary Dissent
oracle_text: Hidden agenda (Start the game with this conspiracy face down in the command zone and secretly name a card. You may turn this conspiracy face up any time and reveal the chosen name.)
Creatures you control with the chosen name have "{R}: This creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn."

name: Natural Unity
oracle_text: Hidden agenda (Start the game with this conspiracy face down in the command zone and secretly name a card. You may turn this conspiracy face up any time and reveal the chosen name.)
Creatures you control with the chosen name have "At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may pay {G}. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature."

name: Sovereign's Realm
oracle_text: (Start the game with this conspiracy face up in the command zone.)
Your deck can't have basic land cards and your starting hand size is five.
Exile a card from your hand: This turn, you may play basic land cards from outside the game.
Basic lands you control have "{T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool."

name: Summoner's Bond
oracle_text: Double agenda (Start the game with this conspiracy face down in the command zone and secretly name two different cards. You may turn this conspiracy face up any time and reveal the chosen names.)

Whenever you cast a creature spell with one of the chosen names, you may search your library for a creature card with the other chosen name, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

name: Weight Advantage
oracle_text: (Start the game with this conspiracy face up in the command zone.)
Each creature you control assigns combat damage equal to its toughness rather than its power.
flavor_text: When immovable object turns to unstoppable force, it's best to just get out of the way.

name: Ballot Broker
oracle_text: While voting, you may vote an additional time. (The votes can be for different choices or for the same choice.)
flavor_text:
"Merchants and politicians differ only in name."
—Queen Marchesa

name: Custodi Peacekeeper
oracle_text: Reveal Custodi Peacekeeper as you draft it and note how many cards you've drafted this draft round, including Custodi Peacekeeper.
{W}, {T}: Tap target creature with power less than or equal to the highest number you noted for cards named Custodi Peacekeeper.

name: Custodi Soulcaller
oracle_text: Melee (Whenever this creature attacks, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each opponent you attacked with a creature this combat.)

Whenever Custodi Soulcaller attacks, return target creature card with converted mana cost X or less from your graveyard to the battlefield, where X is the number of players you attacked with a creature this combat.

name: Lieutenants of the Guard
oracle_text: Council's dilemma — When Lieutenants of the Guard enters the battlefield, starting with you, each player votes for strength or numbers. Put a +1/+1 counter on Lieutenants of the Guard for each strength vote and create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token for each numbers vote.

name: Noble Banneret
oracle_text: Draft Noble Banneret face up.
As you draft a creature card, you may reveal it, note its name, then turn Noble Banneret face down.
As long as you control one or more creatures with a name you noted for cards named Noble Banneret, Noble Banneret and those creatures get +1/+1 and have lifelink.

name: Palace Jailer
oracle_text: When Palace Jailer enters the battlefield, you become the monarch.
When Palace Jailer enters the battlefield, exile target creature an opponent controls until an opponent becomes the monarch. (That creature returns under its owner's control.)

name: Palace Sentinels
oracle_text: When Palace Sentinels enters the battlefield, you become the monarch.
flavor_text:
"One who ruled willing subjects would need no such protection."
—Adriana, Captain of the Guard

name: Paliano Vanguard
oracle_text: Draft Paliano Vanguard face up.
As you draft a creature card, you may reveal it, note its creature types, then turn Paliano Vanguard face down.
Other creatures you control of a type you noted for cards named Paliano Vanguard get +1/+1.

name: Protector of the Crown
oracle_text: When Protector of the Crown enters the battlefield, you become the monarch.
All damage that would be dealt to you is dealt to Protector of the Crown instead.
flavor_text: "I gladly offer my weapon and my life to the glory of my sovereign."

name: Recruiter of the Guard
oracle_text: When Recruiter of the Guard enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a creature card with toughness 2 or less, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.
flavor_text: Before a cause can have supporters, it has to have a voice.

name: Sanctum Prelate
oracle_text: As Sanctum Prelate enters the battlefield, choose a number.
Noncreature spells with converted mana cost equal to the chosen number can't be cast.
flavor_text: "These halls are sacred. You will be silent."

name: Spectral Grasp
oracle_text: Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't attack you or a planeswalker you control.
Enchanted creature can't block creatures you control.

name: Throne Warden
oracle_text: At the beginning of your end step, if you're the monarch, put a +1/+1 counter on Throne Warden.
flavor_text: "Rulers come and go, but my allegiance belongs to the throne."

name: Wings of the Guard
oracle_text: Flying
Melee (Whenever this creature attacks, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each opponent you attacked with a creature this combat.)
flavor_text: Within the city walls, Adriana's falcons hunt vermin of all kinds.

name: Arcane Savant
oracle_text: Before you shuffle your deck to start the game, you may reveal this card from your deck and exile an instant or sorcery card you drafted that isn't in your deck.
When Arcane Savant enters the battlefield, copy a card you exiled with cards named Arcane Savant. You may cast the copy without paying its mana cost.

name: Canal Courier
oracle_text: When Canal Courier enters the battlefield, you become the monarch.
Whenever Canal Courier and another creature attack different players, Canal Courier can't be blocked this combat.
flavor_text: The most effective roadways in Paliano aren't roads at all.

name: Coveted Peacock
oracle_text: Flying

Whenever Coveted Peacock attacks, you may goad target creature defending player controls. (Until your next turn, that creature attacks each combat if able and attacks a player other than you if able.)

name: Expropriate
oracle_text: Council's dilemma — Starting with you, each player votes for time or money. For each time vote, take an extra turn after this one. For each money vote, choose a permanent owned by the voter and gain control of it. Exile Expropriate.
flavor_text: Few things are more valuable than time or money—and Leovold has plenty of both.

name: Illusion of Choice
oracle_text: You choose how each player votes this turn.
Draw a card.
flavor_text:
"Please vote with a clear head and vigilant heart, knowing each voice is meaningful regardless of the outcome."
—Ottavio d'Oro,
Electoral Committee Speaker of Paliano

name: Illusionary Informant
oracle_text: Draft Illusionary Informant face up.
During the draft, you may turn Illusionary Informant face down. If you do, look at the next card drafted by a player of your choice.
Flying

name: Jeering Homunculus
oracle_text: When Jeering Homunculus enters the battlefield, you may goad target creature. (Until your next turn, that creature attacks each combat if able and attacks a player other than you if able.)
flavor_text: Mklthd had always hated crowds . . . and they had always hated him.

name: Keeper of Keys
oracle_text: When Keeper of Keys enters the battlefield, you become the monarch.
At the beginning of your upkeep, if you're the monarch, creatures you control can't be blocked this turn.
flavor_text: For the right price, he'll unlock your path to the throne.

name: Messenger Jays
oracle_text: Flying

Council's dilemma — When Messenger Jays enters the battlefield, starting with you, each player votes for feather or quill. Put a +1/+1 counter on Messenger Jays for each feather vote and draw a card for each quill vote. For each card drawn this way, discard a card.

name: Skittering Crustacean
oracle_text: {6}{U}: Monstrosity 4. (If this creature isn't monstrous, put four +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.)
As long as Skittering Crustacean is monstrous, it has hexproof. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)

name: Spire Phantasm
oracle_text: Reveal Spire Phantasm as you draft it. The next time a player drafts a card from this booster pack, guess that card's name. Then that player reveals the drafted card.
Flying
When Spire Phantasm enters the battlefield, if you guessed correctly for a card named Spire Phantasm, draw a card.

name: Stunt Double
oracle_text: Flash
You may have Stunt Double enter the battlefield as a copy of any creature on the battlefield.
flavor_text: No duelist is without equal in Paliano.

name: Archdemon of Paliano
oracle_text: Draft Archdemon of Paliano face up.

As long as Archdemon of Paliano is face up during the draft, you can't look at booster packs and must draft cards at random. After you draft three cards this way, turn Archdemon of Paliano face down. (You may look at cards as you draft them.)
Flying

name: Capital Punishment
oracle_text: Council's dilemma — Starting with you, each player votes for death or taxes. Each opponent sacrifices a creature for each death vote and discards a card for each taxes vote.
flavor_text:
"I did offer them a choice . . ."
—Queen Marchesa

name: Custodi Lich
oracle_text: When Custodi Lich enters the battlefield, you become the monarch.
Whenever you become the monarch, target player sacrifices a creature.
flavor_text:
"Keeping order is a task too important to relinquish in death."
—Abrado, Custodi priest

name: Deadly Designs
oracle_text: {2}: Put a plot counter on Deadly Designs. Any player may activate this ability.
When there are five or more plot counters on Deadly Designs, sacrifice it. If you do, destroy up to two target creatures.

name: Garrulous Sycophant
oracle_text: At the beginning of your end step, if you're the monarch, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
flavor_text:
"Marchesa's poison is delivered by more than daggers."
—Adriana, Captain of the Guard

name: Marchesa's Decree
oracle_text: When Marchesa's Decree enters the battlefield, you become the monarch.
Whenever a creature attacks you or a planeswalker you control, that creature's controller loses 1 life.
flavor_text:
"Those who seize power must have the means to hold it."
—Queen Marchesa

name: Regicide
oracle_text: Reveal Regicide as you draft it. The player to your right chooses a color, you choose another color, then the player to your left chooses a third color.
Destroy target creature that's one or more of the colors chosen as you drafted cards named Regicide.
flavor_text: "You're done!"

name: Sinuous Vermin
oracle_text: {3}{B}{B}: Monstrosity 3. (If this creature isn't monstrous, put three +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.)
As long as Sinuous Vermin is monstrous, it has menace. (It can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)

name: Smuggler Captain
oracle_text: Draft Smuggler Captain face up.
As you draft a card, you may reveal it, note its name, then turn Smuggler Captain face down.

When Smuggler Captain enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a card with a name you noted for cards named Smuggler Captain, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

name: Thorn of the Black Rose
oracle_text: Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)
When Thorn of the Black Rose enters the battlefield, you become the monarch.
flavor_text: If bribery and intimidation fail, Marchesa turns to her favorite form of bureaucracy.

name: Besmirch
oracle_text: Until end of turn, gain control of target creature and it gains haste. Untap and goad that creature. (Until your next turn, that creature attacks each combat if able and attacks a player other than you if able.)
flavor_text: The whitest robes stain best.

name: Crown-Hunter Hireling
oracle_text: When Crown-Hunter Hireling enters the battlefield, you become the monarch.
Crown-Hunter Hireling can't attack unless defending player is the monarch.
flavor_text: While most in Paliano seek fame through favor, he'll settle for infamy through blood.

name: Deputized Protester
oracle_text: Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
Melee (Whenever this creature attacks, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each opponent you attacked with a creature this combat.)
flavor_text: Butcher's training, warrior's heart.

name: Garbage Fire
oracle_text: Reveal Garbage Fire as you draft it and note how many cards you've drafted this draft round, including Garbage Fire.
Garbage Fire deals damage to target creature equal to the highest number you noted for cards named Garbage Fire.

name: Goblin Racketeer
oracle_text: Whenever Goblin Racketeer attacks, you may goad target creature defending player controls. (Until your next turn, that creature attacks each combat if able and attacks a player other than you if able.)
flavor_text: "It, uh, fell off a cart?"

name: Grenzo, Havoc Raiser
oracle_text: Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to a player, choose one —
• Goad target creature that player controls.
• Exile the top card of that player's library. Until end of turn, you may cast that card and you may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast it.
flavor_text: "You burn. I'll pillage."

name: Grenzo's Ruffians
oracle_text: Melee (Whenever this creature attacks, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each opponent you attacked with a creature this combat.)
Whenever Grenzo's Ruffians deals combat damage to an opponent, it deals that much damage to each other opponent.

name: Pyretic Hunter
oracle_text: Reveal Pyretic Hunter as you draft it and note how many cards you've drafted this draft round, including Pyretic Hunter.
Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
Pyretic Hunter enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it, where X is the highest number you noted for cards named Pyretic Hunter.

name: Skyline Despot
oracle_text: Flying
When Skyline Despot enters the battlefield, you become the monarch.
At the beginning of your upkeep, if you're the monarch, create a 5/5 red Dragon creature token with flying.

name: Subterranean Tremors
oracle_text: Subterranean Tremors deals X damage to each creature without flying. If X is 4 or more, destroy all artifacts. If X is 8 or more, create an 8/8 red Lizard creature token.
flavor_text: The market is now closed.

name: Volatile Chimera
oracle_text: Before you shuffle your deck to start the game, you may reveal this card from your deck and exile three or more creature cards you drafted that aren't in your deck.
{1}{R}: Choose a card at random you exiled with cards named Volatile Chimera. Volatile Chimera becomes a copy of that card and gains this ability.

name: Animus of Predation
oracle_text: Draft Animus of Predation face up.
As you draft a card, you may remove it from the draft face up. (It isn't in your card pool.)

If you removed a creature card with flying from the draft with cards named Animus of Predation, Animus of Predation has flying. The same is true for first strike, double strike, deathtouch, haste, hexproof, indestructible, lifelink, menace, reach, and vigilance.

name: Borderland Explorer
oracle_text: When Borderland Explorer enters the battlefield, each player may discard a card. Each player who discarded a card this way may search his or her library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into his or her hand, then shuffle his or her library.

name: Caller of the Untamed
oracle_text: Before you shuffle your deck to start the game, you may reveal this card from your deck and exile a creature card you drafted that isn't in your deck.
{X}, {T}: Create a token that's a copy of a card you exiled with cards named Caller of the Untamed. X is the converted mana cost of that card.

name: Domesticated Hydra
oracle_text: {X}{G}{G}{G}: Monstrosity X. (If this creature isn't monstrous, put X +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.)
As long as Domesticated Hydra is monstrous, it has trample.
flavor_text: "Sit. Fetch. Devastate."

name: Entourage of Trest
oracle_text: When Entourage of Trest enters the battlefield, you become the monarch.
Entourage of Trest can block an additional creature each combat as long as you're the monarch.
flavor_text:
"The dim resort to violence, for which the nimble prepare."
—Leovold, emissary of Trest

name: Fang of the Pack
oracle_text: Melee (Whenever this creature attacks, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each opponent you attacked with a creature this combat.)
At the beginning of combat on your turn, another target creature you control gains melee until end of turn. (If a creature has multiple instances of melee, each triggers separately.)

name: Leovold's Operative
oracle_text: Draft Leovold's Operative face up.

As you draft a card, you may draft an additional card from that booster pack. If you do, turn Leovold's Operative face down, then pass the next booster pack without drafting a card from it. (You may look at that booster pack.)

name: Menagerie Liberator
oracle_text: Trample
Melee (Whenever this creature attacks, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each opponent you attacked with a creature this combat.)
flavor_text: "The wild are neither your thralls nor your amusement."

name: Orchard Elemental
oracle_text: Council's dilemma — When Orchard Elemental enters the battlefield, starting with you, each player votes for sprout or harvest. Put two +1/+1 counters on Orchard Elemental for each sprout vote. You gain 3 life for each harvest vote.
flavor_text: Fruits for friends, fists for foes.

name: Regal Behemoth
oracle_text: Trample
When Regal Behemoth enters the battlefield, you become the monarch.
Whenever you tap a land for mana while you're the monarch, add one mana of any color to your mana pool (in addition to the mana the land produces).

name: Selvala, Heart of the Wilds
oracle_text: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield, its controller may draw a card if its power is greater than each other creature's power.
{G}, {T}: Add X mana in any combination of colors to your mana pool, where X is the greatest power among creatures you control.

name: Selvala's Stampede
oracle_text: Council's dilemma — Starting with you, each player votes for wild or free. Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a creature card for each wild vote. Put those creature cards onto the battlefield, then shuffle the rest into your library. You may put a permanent card from your hand onto the battlefield for each free vote.

name: Splitting Slime
oracle_text: {4}{G}{G}: Monstrosity 3. (If this creature isn't monstrous, put three +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.)
When Splitting Slime becomes monstrous, create a token that's a copy of Splitting Slime. (The token has no counters and isn't monstrous.)

name: Adriana, Captain of the Guard
oracle_text: Melee (Whenever this creature attacks, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each opponent you attacked with a creature this combat.)
Other creatures you control have melee. (If a creature has multiple instances of melee, each triggers separately.)
flavor_text: "My sword is pledged to the defense of this city, not to the throne or this usurper."

name: Daretti, Ingenious Iconoclast
oracle_text: +1: Create a 1/1 colorless Construct artifact creature token with defender.
−1: You may sacrifice an artifact. If you do, destroy target artifact or creature.
−6: Choose target artifact card in a graveyard or artifact on the battlefield. Create three tokens that are copies of it.

name: Kaya, Ghost Assassin
oracle_text: 0: Exile Kaya, Ghost Assassin or up to one target creature. Return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of your next upkeep. You lose 2 life.
−1: Each opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.
−2: Each opponent discards a card and you draw a card.

name: Kaya, Ghost Assassin
oracle_text: 0: Exile Kaya, Ghost Assassin or up to one target creature. Return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of your next upkeep. You lose 2 life.
−1: Each opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.
−2: Each opponent discards a card and you draw a card.

name: Knights of the Black Rose
oracle_text: When Knights of the Black Rose enters the battlefield, you become the monarch.
Whenever an opponent becomes the monarch, if you were the monarch as the turn began, that player loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.
flavor_text: "Hail to the true queen! Long may she reign!"

name: Leovold, Emissary of Trest
oracle_text: Each opponent can't draw more than one card each turn.
Whenever you or a permanent you control becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, you may draw a card.
flavor_text: "I'm sure we can come to an arrangement."

name: Queen Marchesa
oracle_text: Deathtouch, haste
When Queen Marchesa enters the battlefield, you become the monarch.
At the beginning of your upkeep, if an opponent is the monarch, create a 1/1 black Assassin creature token with deathtouch and haste.

name: Spy Kit
oracle_text: Equipped creature gets +1/+1 and has all names of nonlegendary creature cards in addition to its name.
Equip {2}
flavor_text: Imitation is the sincerest form of treachery.

name: Throne of the High City
oracle_text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool.
{4}, {T}, Sacrifice Throne of the High City: You become the monarch.
flavor_text: A shining symbol of Paliano's true ruler—ambition.

name: Affa Guard Hound
oracle_text: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
When Affa Guard Hound enters the battlefield, target creature gets +0/+3 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Once a welcoming hub for explorers, Affa became a place of guarded tongues and quick defenses.

name: Disenchant
oracle_text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
flavor_text:
The scepter of power is fragile in a calloused hand.
—Cho-Arrim saying

name: Doomed Traveler
oracle_text: When Doomed Traveler dies, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.
flavor_text: He vowed he would never rest until he reached his destination. He doesn't know how right he was.

name: Faith's Reward
oracle_text: Return to the battlefield all permanent cards in your graveyard that were put there from the battlefield this turn.
flavor_text:
"I thought the wind was ushering me to my final destination, but it lifted me to my feet and I fought on."
—Idrus, war priest of Thune

name: Ghostly Possession
oracle_text: Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has flying.
Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to and dealt by enchanted creature.

name: Ghostly Prison
oracle_text: Creatures can't attack you unless their controller pays {2} for each creature he or she controls that's attacking you.
flavor_text:
"May the memory of our fallen heroes ensnare the violent hearts of lesser men."
—Great Threshold of Monserkat inscription

name: Gleam of Resistance
oracle_text: Creatures you control get +1/+2 until end of turn. Untap those creatures.
Basic landcycling {1}{W} ({1}{W}, Discard this card: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.)

name: Gods Willing
oracle_text: Target creature you control gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn. Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)
flavor_text: Honor the gods of Theros, and they will return the favor.

name: Guardian of the Gateless
oracle_text: Flying
Guardian of the Gateless can block any number of creatures.
Whenever Guardian of the Gateless blocks, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each creature it's blocking.

name: Hail of Arrows
oracle_text: Hail of Arrows deals X damage divided as you choose among any number of target attacking creatures.
flavor_text:
"Do not let a single shaft loose until my word. And when I give that word, do not leave a single shaft in Eiganjo."
—General Takeno

name: Hallowed Burial
oracle_text: Put all creatures on the bottom of their owners' libraries.
flavor_text:
"I'd rather hear the screams of battle than the quiet that follows."
—Talara, elvish safewright

name: Hollowhenge Spirit
oracle_text: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
Flying
When Hollowhenge Spirit enters the battlefield, remove target attacking or blocking creature from combat.
flavor_text: Some spirits mourn. Others terrorize.

name: Hundred-Handed One
oracle_text: Vigilance
{3}{W}{W}{W}: Monstrosity 3. (If this creature isn't monstrous, put three +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.)
As long as Hundred-Handed One is monstrous, it has reach and can block an additional ninety-nine creatures each combat.

name: Kill Shot
oracle_text: Destroy target attacking creature.
flavor_text: Mardu archers are trained in Dakla, the way of the bow. They never miss their target, no matter how small, how fast, or how far away.

name: Pariah
oracle_text: Enchant creature
All damage that would be dealt to you is dealt to enchanted creature instead.
flavor_text: "It is not sad," Radiant chided the lesser angel. "It is right. Every society must have its outcasts."

name: Raise the Alarm
oracle_text: Create two 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens.
flavor_text: Like blinking or breathing, responding to an alarm is an involuntary reflex.

name: Reviving Dose
oracle_text: You gain 3 life.
Draw a card.
flavor_text: Samite healers never mix their pungent elixir with sweetener or tea. The threat of a second dose is enough to get most warriors back on their feet.

name: Spirit of the Hearth
oracle_text: Flying
You have hexproof. (You can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)
flavor_text: Thieves know that a snarl in the night means, "Rob another house."

name: Wild Griffin
oracle_text: Flying
flavor_text: Farmers typically keep their flocks at thirteen sheep—one to distract the griffins while they take the other twelve to market.

name: Windborne Charge
oracle_text: Two target creatures you control each get +2/+2 and gain flying until end of turn.
flavor_text: The merfolk call the sky goddess Emeria. The kor call her Kamsa. The two races agree on little except that she offers many blessings to the faithful.

name: Zealous Strike
oracle_text: Target creature gets +2/+2 and gains first strike until end of turn.
flavor_text: "Cower, fiend. The night is yours no longer."

name: Bonds of Quicksilver
oracle_text: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.
flavor_text: The sea's reach extends beyond its shores.

name: Caller of Gales
oracle_text: {1}{U}, {T}: Target creature gains flying until end of turn.
flavor_text: "Some merfolk choose to rest their fins in the water. I believe wisdom exists not only where we were born but where we were told not to go."

name: Cloaked Siren
oracle_text: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
Flying
flavor_text:
"That is not the voice of the wind singing on the stones."
—Callaphe the mariner

name: Covenant of Minds
oracle_text: Reveal the top three cards of your library. Target opponent may choose to put those cards into your hand. If he or she doesn't, put those cards into your graveyard and draw five cards.
flavor_text: Before signing anything on Grixis, always read the fine print.

name: Deceiver Exarch
oracle_text: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
When Deceiver Exarch enters the battlefield, choose one —
• Untap target permanent you control.
• Tap target permanent an opponent controls.

name: Desertion
oracle_text: Counter target spell. If an artifact or creature spell is countered this way, put that card onto the battlefield under your control instead of into its owner's graveyard.
flavor_text: First the insult, then the injury.

name: Dismiss
oracle_text: Counter target spell.
Draw a card.
flavor_text:
"There is nothing you can do that I cannot simply deny."
—Ertai, wizard adept

name: Divination
oracle_text: Draw two cards.
flavor_text:
"The key to unlocking this puzzle is within you."
—Doriel, mentor of Mistral Isle

name: Fleeting Distraction
oracle_text: Target creature gets -1/-0 until end of turn.
Draw a card.
flavor_text: The first spell taught to young mages, it has spared the lives of many whose hands are too small to hold a sword.

name: Followed Footsteps
oracle_text: Enchant creature
At the beginning of your upkeep, create a token that's a copy of enchanted creature.
flavor_text: Æther can turn a footprint into a blueprint.

name: Into the Void
oracle_text: Return up to two target creatures to their owners' hands.
flavor_text:
"The cathars have their swords, the inquisitors their axes. I prefer the ‘diplomatic' approach."
—Terhold, archmage of Drunau

name: Kami of the Crescent Moon
oracle_text: At the beginning of each player's draw step, that player draws an additional card.
flavor_text:
"He's a lot like me, that masterless little kami . . . unimpressed by grandeur and never at a loss for a trick."
—Toshiro Umezawa

name: Merfolk Looter
oracle_text: {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.
flavor_text: Merfolk don't always know what they're looking for, but they're certain once they find it.

name: Merfolk Skyscout
oracle_text: Flying
Whenever Merfolk Skyscout attacks or blocks, untap target permanent.
flavor_text: "Emeria is a pleasant lie, a figment to hide Emrakul's hideous face. I can only hope to uncover a truth that lies deeper still."

name: Mnemonic Wall
oracle_text: Defender
When Mnemonic Wall enters the battlefield, you may return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text:
"I'd build an entire fortress of them if I could."
—Mzali, Lighthouse archmage

name: Negate
oracle_text: Counter target noncreature spell.
flavor_text:
"You cannot be an Ojutai monk. They prize wisdom and skill, and you have neither."
—Siara, the Dragon's Mouth

name: Omenspeaker
oracle_text: When Omenspeaker enters the battlefield, scry 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)
flavor_text: Her prophecies amaze her even as she speaks them.

name: Repulse
oracle_text: Return target creature to its owner's hand.
Draw a card.
flavor_text: "You aren't invited."

name: Serum Visions
oracle_text: Draw a card. Scry 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

name: Show and Tell
oracle_text: Each player may put an artifact, creature, enchantment, or land card from his or her hand onto the battlefield.
flavor_text: At the academy, "show and tell" too often becomes "run and hide."

name: Sphinx of Magosi
oracle_text: Flying
{2}{U}: Draw a card, then put a +1/+1 counter on Sphinx of Magosi.
flavor_text: "A riddle is nothing more than a trap for small minds, baited with the promise of understanding."

name: Traumatic Visions
oracle_text: Counter target spell.
Basic landcycling {1}{U} ({1}{U}, Discard this card: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.)

name: Vaporkin
oracle_text: Flying
Vaporkin can block only creatures with flying.
flavor_text:
"Mists are carefree. They drift where they will, unencumbered by rocks and river beds."
—Thrasios, triton hero

name: Vertigo Spawn
oracle_text: Defender
Whenever Vertigo Spawn blocks a creature, tap that creature. That creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

name: Absorb Vis
oracle_text: Target player loses 4 life and you gain 4 life.
Basic landcycling {1}{B} ({1}{B}, Discard this card: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.)

name: Altar's Reap
oracle_text: As an additional cost to cast Altar's Reap, sacrifice a creature.
Draw two cards.
flavor_text:
"Don't worry, your death will be as informative as possible."
—Gorghul, augur of skulls

name: Avatar of Woe
oracle_text: If there are ten or more creature cards total in all graveyards, Avatar of Woe costs {6} less to cast.
Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)
{T}: Destroy target creature. It can't be regenerated.

name: Blood-Toll Harpy
oracle_text: Flying
When Blood-Toll Harpy enters the battlefield, each player loses 1 life.
flavor_text: When harpies demand a toll to cross through their territory, consider yourself lucky if they permit payment in coin.

name: Child of Night
oracle_text: Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)
flavor_text: Sins that would be too gruesome in the light of day are made more pleasing in the dark of night.

name: Death Wind
oracle_text: Target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn.
flavor_text: Leukin stared at the smoldering angel feathers. "Run!" he screamed to his patrol. "We don't stand a chance!"

name: Diabolic Tutor
oracle_text: Search your library for a card and put that card into your hand. Then shuffle your library.
flavor_text: The wise always keep an ear open to the whispers of power.

name: Driver of the Dead
oracle_text: When Driver of the Dead dies, return target creature card with converted mana cost 2 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.
flavor_text: Some vampires resorted to corpse trading after cathars burned their estates and drove them from their ancestral feeding grounds.

name: Farbog Boneflinger
oracle_text: When Farbog Boneflinger enters the battlefield, target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Here are some bones for you to choke on, dear brother!"
—Gisa, to Geralf

name: Festergloom
oracle_text: Nonblack creatures get -1/-1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: The death of a scout can be as informative as a safe return.

name: Fleshbag Marauder
oracle_text: When Fleshbag Marauder enters the battlefield, each player sacrifices a creature.
flavor_text: Grixis is a world where the only things found in abundance are death and decay. Corpses, whole or in part, are the standard currency among necromancers and demons.

name: Guul Draz Specter
oracle_text: Flying
Guul Draz Specter gets +3/+3 as long as an opponent has no cards in hand.
Whenever Guul Draz Specter deals combat damage to a player, that player discards a card.

name: Harvester of Souls
oracle_text: Deathtouch
Whenever another nontoken creature dies, you may draw a card.
flavor_text:
"He is judge, jury, and executioner because he killed them all."
—Bishop Cawle of Elgaud

name: Infest
oracle_text: All creatures get -2/-2 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"This is why we don't go out in banewasp weather."
—Rannon, Vithian holdout

name: Inquisition of Kozilek
oracle_text: Target player reveals his or her hand. You choose a nonland card from it with converted mana cost 3 or less. That player discards that card.
flavor_text: You will scream out your innermost secrets just to make it stop.

name: Keepsake Gorgon
oracle_text: Deathtouch
{5}{B}{B}: Monstrosity 1. (If this creature isn't monstrous, put a +1/+1 counter on it and it becomes monstrous.)
When Keepsake Gorgon becomes monstrous, destroy target non-Gorgon creature an opponent controls.

name: Mausoleum Turnkey
oracle_text: When Mausoleum Turnkey enters the battlefield, return target creature card of an opponent's choice from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: When he reaches for his key ring, you should be running for the exit.

name: Murder
oracle_text: Destroy target creature.

name: Phyrexian Arena
oracle_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.
flavor_text: A spark of resistance against a tide of corruption.

name: Public Execution
oracle_text: Destroy target creature an opponent controls. Each other creature that player controls gets -2/-0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Though the executioner did not speak, the villagers got the message.

name: Raise Dead
oracle_text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: The earth cannot hold that which magic commands.

name: Sangromancer
oracle_text: Flying
Whenever a creature an opponent controls dies, you may gain 3 life.
Whenever an opponent discards a card, you may gain 3 life.

name: Shambling Goblin
oracle_text: When Shambling Goblin dies, target creature an opponent controls gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"The Kolaghan send them at us. We kill and raise them. They fight the next wave the Kolaghan send. It's a neat little cycle."
—Asmala, Silumgar sorcerer

name: Stromkirk Patrol
oracle_text: Whenever Stromkirk Patrol deals combat damage to a player, put a +1/+1 counter on it.
flavor_text: "You'd best move along, human. Our palates are far less discerning than our master's."

name: Unnerve
oracle_text: Each opponent discards two cards.
flavor_text:
"If fear is the only tool you have left, then you'll never control me."
—Xantcha, to Gix

name: Burn Away
oracle_text: Burn Away deals 6 damage to target creature. When that creature dies this turn, exile all cards from its controller's graveyard.
flavor_text:
"Your corruption will burn, serpent, until there is nothing left to defile."
—Asmala, bloodfire mystic

name: Burning Wish
oracle_text: You may choose a sorcery card you own from outside the game, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. Exile Burning Wish.
flavor_text: She wished for a weapon, but not for the skill to wield it.

name: Charmbreaker Devils
oracle_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, return an instant or sorcery card at random from your graveyard to your hand.
Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, Charmbreaker Devils gets +4/+0 until end of turn.

name: Coordinated Assault
oracle_text: Up to two target creatures each get +1/+0 and gain first strike until end of turn.
flavor_text: It's hard to shout "Shields up!" with a javelin in your chest.

name: Ember Beast
oracle_text: Ember Beast can't attack or block alone.
flavor_text: The only livestock that will survive for long in the Smelting District, ember beasts serve many functions—none of them willingly.

name: Fiery Fall
oracle_text: Fiery Fall deals 5 damage to target creature.
Basic landcycling {1}{R} ({1}{R}, Discard this card: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.)

name: Flame Slash
oracle_text: Flame Slash deals 4 damage to target creature.
flavor_text: After millennia asleep, the Eldrazi had forgotten about Zendikar's fiery temper and dislike of strangers.

name: Gang of Devils
oracle_text: When Gang of Devils dies, it deals 3 damage divided as you choose among one, two, or three target creatures and/or players.
flavor_text:
"Well, how could I know they'd explode?"
—Gregel, township militia

name: Goblin Balloon Brigade
oracle_text: {R}: Goblin Balloon Brigade gains flying until end of turn.
flavor_text: "The enemy is getting too close! Quick! Inflate the toad!"

name: Goblin Tunneler
oracle_text: {T}: Target creature with power 2 or less can't be blocked this turn.
flavor_text: "The best way over the mountain is through."

name: Gratuitous Violence
oracle_text: If a creature you control would deal damage to a creature or player, it deals double that damage to that creature or player instead.
flavor_text: Only the Cabal could make a fight to the death more deadly.

name: Guttersnipe
oracle_text: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, Guttersnipe deals 2 damage to each opponent.
flavor_text: He wants to watch Ravnica burn, one soul at a time.

name: Hamletback Goliath
oracle_text: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield, you may put X +1/+1 counters on Hamletback Goliath, where X is that creature's power.
flavor_text:
"If you live on a giant's back, there's only one individual you'll ever need to fear."
—Gaddock Teeg

name: Havengul Vampire
oracle_text: Whenever Havengul Vampire deals combat damage to a player, put a +1/+1 counter on it.
Whenever another creature dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Havengul Vampire.

name: Hurly-Burly
oracle_text: Choose one —
• Hurly-Burly deals 1 damage to each creature without flying.
• Hurly-Burly deals 1 damage to each creature with flying.

name: Ill-Tempered Cyclops
oracle_text: Trample
{5}{R}: Monstrosity 3. (If this creature isn't monstrous, put three +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.)
flavor_text: A cyclops has two moods: angry and asleep.

name: Kiln Fiend
oracle_text: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, Kiln Fiend gets +3/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: It traps an explosion within its stony skin.

name: Ogre Sentry
oracle_text: Defender
flavor_text:
"You have to appreciate the genius of it. Why bother building defenses when you can just fill the pass with angry ogres?"
—Javad Nasrin, Ondu relic hunter

name: Stoneshock Giant
oracle_text: {6}{R}{R}: Monstrosity 3. (If this creature isn't monstrous, put three +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.)
When Stoneshock Giant becomes monstrous, creatures without flying your opponents control can't block this turn.

name: Sulfurous Blast
oracle_text: Sulfurous Blast deals 2 damage to each creature and each player. If you cast this spell during your main phase, Sulfurous Blast deals 3 damage to each creature and each player instead.
flavor_text: The Keldons used the toxic vents in the cracked earth to bolster their home's defenses.

name: Tormenting Voice
oracle_text: As an additional cost to cast Tormenting Voice, discard a card.
Draw two cards.
flavor_text:
"Unwelcome thoughts crowd my mind. Are they my own madness, or the whispers of another?"
—Sarkhan Vol

name: Trumpet Blast
oracle_text: Attacking creatures get +2/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Do you hear that, Sarkhan? The glory of the horde! I made a legend from what you abandoned."
—Zurgo, khan of the Mardu

name: Twin Bolt
oracle_text: Twin Bolt deals 2 damage divided as you choose among one or two target creatures and/or players.
flavor_text: Kolaghan archers are trained in Dakla, the way of the bow. They utilize their dragonlord's lightning to strike their target, no matter how small, how fast, or how far away.

name: Beast Within
oracle_text: Destroy target permanent. Its controller creates a 3/3 green Beast creature token.
flavor_text:
"Monsters dwell in every heart. We only think civilization tames them."
―Euphemia, Nexus watcher

name: Berserk
oracle_text: Cast Berserk only before the combat damage step.
Target creature gains trample and gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is its power. At the beginning of the next end step, destroy that creature if it attacked this turn.

name: Birds of Paradise
oracle_text: Flying
{T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.
flavor_text:
"The gods used their feathers to paint all the colors of the world."
—Yare-Tiva, warden of Gramur Forest

name: Brushstrider
oracle_text: Vigilance
flavor_text: Magistrate Ludy agreed to designate land for the brushstriders only after several broken windows and dozens of missing blini-cakes.

name: Burgeoning
oracle_text: Whenever an opponent plays a land, you may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield.
flavor_text: The first vine shows the others where to grow.

name: Copperhorn Scout
oracle_text: Whenever Copperhorn Scout attacks, untap each other creature you control.
flavor_text: Fangren spur may sound louder, but Viridian resurgents claim that the horn of the vorrac creates a truer, more inspiring note.

name: Explosive Vegetation
oracle_text: Search your library for up to two basic land cards and put them onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your library.
flavor_text: Torching Krosa would be pointless. It grows faster than it burns.

name: Fade into Antiquity
oracle_text: Exile target artifact or enchantment.
flavor_text:
"Are the gods angry at our discontent with what they give us, or jealous that we made a thing they cannot?"
—Kleon the Iron-Booted

name: Forgotten Ancient
oracle_text: Whenever a player casts a spell, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Forgotten Ancient.
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may move any number of +1/+1 counters from Forgotten Ancient onto other creatures.
flavor_text: Its blood is life. Its body is growth.

name: Irresistible Prey
oracle_text: Target creature must be blocked this turn if able.
Draw a card.
flavor_text: The baloth's instincts boiled, its muscles pulled taut, and its razor-spines bristled, as it turned to face—a runt meepling.

name: Lace with Moonglove
oracle_text: Target creature gains deathtouch until end of turn. (Any amount of damage it deals to a creature is enough to destroy that creature.)
Draw a card.
flavor_text:
"Which is more filled with poison: the flower of the moonglove or the minds of elves?"
—Vessifrus, flamekin demagogue

name: Lay of the Land
oracle_text: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.
flavor_text: Victory favors neither the righteous nor the wicked. It favors the prepared.

name: Manaplasm
oracle_text: Whenever you cast a spell, Manaplasm gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is that spell's converted mana cost.
flavor_text: Urak froze when he heard it. That was his first mistake. He turned and cast a dramatic ward spell. That was his last.

name: Nessian Asp
oracle_text: Reach
{6}{G}: Monstrosity 4. (If this creature isn't monstrous, put four +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.)
flavor_text: It's not the two heads you should fear. It's the four fangs.

name: Netcaster Spider
oracle_text: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
Whenever Netcaster Spider blocks a creature with flying, Netcaster Spider gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: It is an expert at culling individuals who stray too far from the herd.

name: Overrun
oracle_text: Creatures you control get +3/+3 and gain trample until end of turn.
flavor_text: Nature doesn't walk.

name: Plummet
oracle_text: Destroy target creature with flying.
flavor_text: The elf's blade carved deep into the Eldrazi drone's fleshy lattices. Without a sound, the drone lost equilibrium and tumbled from the sky.

name: Prey Upon
oracle_text: Target creature you control fights target creature you don't control. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)
flavor_text:
"You don't find many old werewolf hunters."
—Paulin, trapper of Somberwald

name: Ravenous Leucrocota
oracle_text: Vigilance
{6}{G}: Monstrosity 3. (If this creature isn't monstrous, put three +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.)
flavor_text: Hunger makes a leucrocota dangerous. A full belly makes it angry and dangerous.

name: Strength in Numbers
oracle_text: Until end of turn, target creature gains trample and gets +X/+X, where X is the number of attacking creatures.
flavor_text:
"The hermit dies. The outcast dies. The lone wolf dies. Only those who stick together survive this world."
—Uros, Pendelhaven elder

name: Sylvan Bounty
oracle_text: Target player gains 8 life.
Basic landcycling {1}{G} ({1}{G}, Discard this card: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.)

name: Voyaging Satyr
oracle_text: {T}: Untap target land.
flavor_text: "None can own the land's bounty. The gods made this world for all to share its riches. And I'm not just saying that because you caught me stealing your fruit."

name: Wild Pair
oracle_text: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield, if you cast it from your hand, you may search your library for a creature card with the same total power and toughness and put it onto the battlefield. If you do, shuffle your library.

name: Akroan Hoplite
oracle_text: Whenever Akroan Hoplite attacks, it gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is the number of attacking creatures you control.
flavor_text: "Fair fight? How could it be a fair fight? We're Akroans. They're not."

name: Ascended Lawmage
oracle_text: Flying
Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)
flavor_text: A lawmage's runic script is an act of governance given form: legislation written directly onto the air itself.

name: Carnage Gladiator
oracle_text: Whenever a creature blocks, that creature's controller loses 1 life.
{1}{B}{R}: Regenerate Carnage Gladiator.
flavor_text: Not the foulest or bloodiest act at Rix Maadi by a stretch.

name: Coiling Oracle
oracle_text: When Coiling Oracle enters the battlefield, reveal the top card of your library. If it's a land card, put it onto the battlefield. Otherwise, put that card into your hand.
flavor_text: Snaking remnants of nature directed by a body of thought and progress, the oracles embody all that is Simic.

name: Dragonlair Spider
oracle_text: Reach
Whenever an opponent casts a spell, create a 1/1 green Insect creature token.
flavor_text: Swarms thrive in its nest, feeding on leathery bits of discarded wing.

name: Duskmantle Seer
oracle_text: Flying
At the beginning of your upkeep, each player reveals the top card of his or her library, loses life equal to that card's converted mana cost, then puts it into his or her hand.

name: Gruul War Chant
oracle_text: Attacking creatures you control get +1/+0 and have menace. (They can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
flavor_text:
"We are the heart of the wild, the fire in its eyes, and the howl in its throat. Come, join the battle to which you were born."
—Kroshkar, Gruul shaman

name: Juniper Order Ranger
oracle_text: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on that creature and a +1/+1 counter on Juniper Order Ranger.
flavor_text: To protect the alliance between Kjeldor and Yavimaya, they trained in the ways of both.

name: Pharika's Mender
oracle_text: When Pharika's Mender enters the battlefield, you may return target creature or enchantment card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: "The direst venom becomes a panacea under Pharika's guidance. I bring it to the worthy, clinging at the edge of the abyss."

name: Shipwreck Singer
oracle_text: Flying
{1}{U}: Target creature an opponent controls attacks this turn if able.
{1}{B}, {T}: Attacking creatures get -1/-1 until end of turn.

name: Stormchaser Chimera
oracle_text: Flying

{2}{U}{R}: Scry 1, then reveal the top card of your library. Stormchaser Chimera gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is that card's converted mana cost. (To scry 1, look at the top card of your library, then you may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

name: Bronze Sable
flavor_text:
The Champion stood alone between the horde of the Returned and the shrine to Karametra, cutting down scores among hundreds. She would have been overcome if not for the aid of the temple guardians whom Karametra awakened.
—The Theriad

name: Hedron Matrix
oracle_text: Equipped creature gets +X/+X, where X is its converted mana cost.
Equip {4}
flavor_text: The hedrons awoke along with the Eldrazi, forming superstructures that radiated overwhelming magic.

name: Hexplate Golem
flavor_text:
"Use everything. Iron, rust, scrap . . .  even the ground must join our cause."
—Ezuri, renegade leader

name: Horn of Greed
oracle_text: Whenever a player plays a land, that player draws a card.
flavor_text:
"Rath grows, and I am nourished."
—Volrath

name: Kitesail
oracle_text: Equipped creature gets +1/+0 and has flying.
Equip {2} ({2}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)
flavor_text: Kitesailing is a way of life—and without practice, the end of it.

name: Opaline Unicorn
oracle_text: {T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.
flavor_text: Purphoros once loved Nylea, the god of the hunt. His passion inspired his most astounding works of art.

name: Platinum Angel
oracle_text: Flying
You can't lose the game and your opponents can't win the game.
flavor_text: She is the apex of the artificer's craft, the spirit of the divine called out of base metal.

name: Psychosis Crawler
oracle_text: Psychosis Crawler's power and toughness are each equal to the number of cards in your hand.
Whenever you draw a card, each opponent loses 1 life.
flavor_text:
"If that brain can't figure out the secret of the serum, then add more brains."
—Rhmir, Hand of the Augur

name: Runed Servitor
oracle_text: When Runed Servitor dies, each player draws a card.
flavor_text: Scholars had puzzled for centuries over the ruins at Tal Terig. Its secrets had always lived within one rune-carved head.

name: Dread Statuary
oracle_text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool.
{4}: Dread Statuary becomes a 4/2 Golem artifact creature until end of turn. It's still a land.
flavor_text: The last reliable landmark in Tazeem just walked away.

name: Evolving Wilds
oracle_text: {T}, Sacrifice Evolving Wilds: Search your library for a basic land card and put it onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your library.
flavor_text: Without the interfering hands of civilization, nature will always shape itself to its own needs.

name: Exotic Orchard
oracle_text: {T}: Add to your mana pool one mana of any color that a land an opponent controls could produce.
flavor_text:
"It was a strange morning. When we awoke, we found our trees transformed. We didn't know whether to water them or polish them."
—Pulan, Bant orchardist

name: Rogue's Passage
oracle_text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool.
{4}, {T}: Target creature can't be blocked this turn.
flavor_text: Rumors quickly spread among thieves about a labyrinth without walls and a prize beyond all measures of worth.

name: Shimmering Grotto
oracle_text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool.
{1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.
flavor_text: Untold riches await those who forsake the bustling world to search the secret, silent places.
